titles.title: A bill to amend the Black Lung Benefits Act to prohibit the reduction of disability benefits under the Social Security Act.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to Subcommittee on Labor Standards.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 5/20/1987--Introduced. Amends the Black Lung Benefits Act of 1969 to prohibit the reduction of disability benefits under the Social Security Act with respect to black lung claims filed after December 31, 1973.
